page.title: 12Recreation in Linlithgow.
page.content: Linlithgow Rose play in the Eastern Region Football Association League.There are 25 teams in the league at present and Linlithgow Rose are fourth from the top.The average amount taken in at a game is around Â£90.The biggest capacity has been 3562 against Petershill in 1962.Some improvements they would like to make are to the floodlights and seating. Linlithgow Bowling Club,which opened in 1865,has now 127 members of which 30 are juniors.To join it costs Â£52.50.At the moment the club boasts the best green in the whole of West Lothian.The club is in the Lilithgowshire League and last year they came third,when Kirkliston,their greatest rivals,came first.Of all their trophies,their favourite is the Roseberry Cup which they won in 1983 for the first time in 93 years.
